skins.shipDescription: Iron Blood Type VIIB submarine C U-47.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm U-47. I went behind enemy lines at Scapa Flow and sunk Royal Oak. I'm going to go out, sink the enemy, and come back. Just like I did then.
skins.acquisition: Type VIIB submarine, U-47. I don't like crowds... If that's all, I'll be in my room.
skins.details: Are you sending me out? I can handle it by myself.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you need someone to patrol, I'm good to go anytime.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Such a quiet office... I approve.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You looking to take a nap at the bottom of Scapa Flow?

skins.shipDescription: I haven't seen much of the world on land... Commander, want to explore it with me?
skins.acquisition: I haven't seen much of the world on land... Commander, want to explore it with me?
skins.login: Ah, you're here. Me...? Pretty much the same. I just got back.
skins.details: It's not really my style to go out with anybody... But I'm worried about getting lost if I'm alone... Commander, you got plans today?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Nearsighted? No... there are no lenses in them.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you're thirsty... You can have half.
skins.secretaryIdle3: My outfit? My friends picked it out for me. I don't usually think about that stuff...
skins.secretaryTouch: I don't know my way around on land, so... You're my guide.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: How about I take you on a trip to the bottom of the sea? It's really pretty down there too.

skins.shipDescription: Sigh... I'd much rather be in a nice, quiet place like this over the din and clamor of the venue... Wouldn't you agree, Commander? I see. Well, come sit here then.
skins.acquisition: Sigh... I'd much rather be in a nice, quiet place like this over the din and clamor of the venue... Wouldn't you agree, Commander? I see. Well, come sit here then.
skins.details: Another sortie? I'll be right out. ...It's fine, I can go dressed like this.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm a little more talkative now? Huh... I just find I have more to talk about with you.
skins.secretaryIdle2: The party...? I wouldn't know what to do with myself out there.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm always stuck with a bunch of noisy girls: U-73, U-81, U-101... But even though I like it quiet, I really don't mind them that much.
skins.secretaryTouch: Here's to you, for taking good care of me.
